Package util

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ThemeFinder
    We will use this interface to return themes.
    ThumbnailGrabber
    Interface to decouple the thumbfinder from the xuggler implementation.
    XMLSerialisable
    Used as a shared type for XML serialisable classes i.e.: so we can have generic reader and writer
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FileUtil
    Utility class for dealing with file-lookup requirements.
    FrameRate
    Static methods and fields which help with framerates and framerate conversion.
    ThemeFinderImpl
    Finds Theme XML's for MV-CoDA and deserialises them into Themes
    ThumbnailGrabberXuggle
    Intended to provide thumbnails for the MV-CoDA GUI.
    XMLBuilderRunner
    This class was used to create the initial Theme XML files for default themes included in MV-CoDA i.e.: it describes each GFXElement in the three included themes
    XMLReader
    Reads Themes,GFXElement types and Playlists that have been saved by MV-CoDA previously returns these as XMLSerialisables for the caller to cast to the type required
    XMLWriter
    Writes Themes,GFXElement types and Playlists for MV-CoDA You pass these as XMLSerialisables as the associated classes implement XMLSerialisable
